upgrade1Desc.raw: Using Skill will not remove Mark of Counter on the enemy.

upgrade2Desc.raw: After using the Ultimate, ATK increases by 30% for 2 turn(s).

upgrade3Desc.raw: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

upgrade4Desc.raw: After Clara is hit, the DMG taken by Clara is reduced by 30%. This effect lasts until the start of her next turn.

upgrade5Desc.raw: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

upgrade6Desc.raw: After other allies are hit, Svarog also has a 50% fixed chance to trigger a Counter on the attacker and mark them with a Mark of Counter. When using Clara's Ultimate, the number of Enhanced Counters increases by 1.
